website_summaries.verdict: Hop in the water, hike on the trail, or go touring around the town - the Columbia Sandal is undoubtedly a versatile sandal that can make your summer adventures fun and comfortable. It gets high marks for its top-notch comfort, ultra lightness, and sturdy construction. The strapping is a huge plus. Even without the hook and loop, the buckle system perfectly holds the foot in place.While tying it up can be a little challenging for some, this hiking sandal promises comfort and a good fit all the way.
pros: The majority of the Columbia Columbia Sandal reviews say that this stylish hiking sandal is feather-light
Most users find it super comfortable
Several reviewers praise Columbia for creating yet another well-built footwear that can be used for different outdoor activities
Some are happy to announce that they have gotten great compliments for this great-looking sandal
It has an effective strapping design that keeps the foot secure, according to a couple of wearers
Most verified buyers consider it the perfect sandal for summer escapades on the trail and in the city
cons: A hiker has issues "tying" the straps as he feels that it's a little too short
It's also very hard to tie if you are someone with big hands, says another reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfy. Sized a little small.
customer_reviews.text: Super lightweight and quite comfortable once I traded up to a size larger than normal. Any other size 13 fits me fine, but my foot just hung over the footbed. I wish the straps were a little thicker as they tend to fold or bunch up where they pass through the side buckles, and they could also be half an inch longer to make putting them on easier. They don’t feel like they’ll last all that long, but long lasting sandals (a year or more) from any brand seem to be a thing of the past.
customer_reviews.author: Ken B

customer_reviews.title: Columbia Sandal Dud
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of Columbia products head to toe because of quality, fit and value. Purchased (now returning) pair of these sandals Late in season I know but now I know why they had such a selection. This is a well below average product for any outdoor purpose: ordered 1/2 size larger (always works for my Columbia sandals) and way too small. The binding system is totally inadequate in length and construction. Would appear to have been designed by someone for whom "outdoors" is equivalent to a mall. Going to continue to shop Columbia and just hope this is a single item miss and not a new direction for the company.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great, but..
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind the men's sandals are in mens sizes and the women's in women sizes. I purchased the men blue model and it was very comfortable, however the front is a little short so your toes arent protected if you were to bump into a step or accidentally kick a rock. I understand this is an issue with most open toe sandals, but keens and tevas offer models with a wider and longer open toe rubber that protects your feet. I did really like the extra pieces of cloth under the straps that further protect your feet from friction blisters.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Straps are too short
customer_reviews.text: if you order your correct size, the straps are too small; and if you order a size for the straps, your feet are swimming in them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Definitely smaller than true size
customer_reviews.text: Order 1 size up (at least men) and avoid issues with returns/refunds. I always wear size 10 on any type of shoe. But with these sandals my heels and toes reach (beyond) the sole's edges. Size 11 should be perfect for me. I'm just so pissed off because I used a $10 promotional credit and now it's lost since I'll have to return these size 10. I tried to swap for size 11 but they can't exchange (so they said). Other than the size the sandals are awesome, great quality, comfortable, the blue ones (I ordered) look beautiful, bright color just as in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Herbey

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: Like walking on air! These sandals are light weight and very comfortable. I like the easy to adjust strap. I rarely write reviews but these are a great product.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: The sandal fits small. I’d guess one size too small based off the Amazon size chart. Most shoes I own are 29cm and these fall short of the recommended size. I also was not a fan of the foam liner where your feet go. I prefer one solid sole to prevent splitting or additional wear and tear. I purchased these after owning a pair of Columbia Riptide II’s and they do not compare in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: Way to small straps. The strap going across from the toes to ankle makes these sandals look like women's sandals. Which makes sense why the straps are so small. Just my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: Very flimsy
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely flimsy. I was hoping these would be a cheaper alternative to chacos. Better just save up and buy the real thing because these are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: alyson phillips

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Damn Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: It's near perfect! Less frumpy then velcros. My only complaint is that it squeaks - not sure if it's from my bare feet, but a plastic film/top coat came off a little too. Will wait to see how they hold up this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Xiong T.

customer_reviews.title: Rugged sandals
customer_reviews.text: I like these sandals quite a bit. The only thing I would have liked more is the cushioning. Although it’s comfortable, I’d still think teva soles are slightly better after an active long day.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Mai

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are really comfortable but they take some effort to put on. I am used to my old Merrells that I could slip right into.
customer_reviews.author: Indigoshawn

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the lookout for a sandals to hike in both land and water, as I love water hikes. This is pretty good and they actually look stylist.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Very confy & fancy, while not heavy duty.
customer_reviews.text: I chose it for its design, I love it. But if you are 10 1/2 you have to select 11 size. Meanwhile sandal is not heavy duty is extremely confortable for daily use. Is very soft. Do not buy if you want it for rough terrain or too demanding activity. Is well made, although a little messy to get in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable, simple, strudy
customer_reviews.text: Classy and very comfortable, simple, strudy, and i like it !!!!
customer_reviews.author: keyan

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are very lightweight and provide a lot of cushion support. Did not want anything with velcro since they wear out over time. These are a pain to take on and off since you have to loop the strap in. Otherwise, they're very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki J

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the style and color. Would have liked the straps to have velcro but I knew in advance that they didn't. I still really like them.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe. Order above your size.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first order, these are sized small. Like very small. I wear a 10.5 and had to order a 12 to fit. Very comfortable and lightweight. The closure takes a minute to get used to. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes if you don't have a dog
customer_reviews.text: I liked those sandals. Unfortunately after 1 month of owning them, my dog decided he liked them too and my sandals were destroyed after 1 bite.
customer_reviews.author: Joel F.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Fit great and not too heavy like Chacos or other sport sandals. They are more comfortable for the toes than the Teva sandals as well. Great choice!
customer_reviews.author: flnorwood

customer_reviews.title: I can't adjust the clasp to fit my leg
customer_reviews.text: the size is suitable, but the mounts are completely stupid. I can't adjust the clasp to fit my leg ... very goofy system!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Miss leading colors, a bit narrow, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I will update this review after a month or so... It doesn't make sense to review before actually using it for a while. For now I guess you could say it's a bit narrow and the color is yellow not dark orang
customer_reviews.author: Fathaldin

customer_reviews.title: One of my best purchases!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit great. They look exactly like i wanted them to on my feet. Will be buying again in a different color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Porter Jon

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not true to size! Gave the size 14 to my son who wears a size 12
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, go-to lightweight adventure sandals
customer_reviews.text: My go-to lightweight beach and camping sandals. Don’t expect stability like sole of hiking boots, but more than necessary for hanging around a campsite, beach walks, or a walk in the woods. Fit slightly larger than anticipated, I have to fasten all the way when going sockless. The color rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Tim

product_meta.title: Columbia Sandal
product_meta.description: With a combination of superior comfort, fit, arch support and traction, this Columbia sandal will be the only sandal you’ll want for whatever adventure you are on, both off road or on.
